exceptions.tactic: intros l k H x Hx.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} l : list op k : K H : forall x : op, In x l -> exists k : K, x = I k Unable to unify "op_equivalent (?M1775 :: ?M1776) (?M1775 :: ?M1777)" with "op_equivalent (l ++ [I k]) (I k :: l)".
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

original: intros l k H x Hx. inv Hx; simpl. - apply op_equiv_cons, H. left. reflexivity. - eapply op_equiv_trans. + eapply op_equiv_cons, H. left. reflexivity. + apply op_equiv_move. apply good_op_move_cases in H0 as [?|[?|(?&?&?)]]; subst; auto. apply H. left. reflexivity.
